name: IP_LINKED_CSN
description: This table displays the Contact Serial Numbers (CSNs) for linked contacts.

columns.name: INPATIENT_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the inpatient record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LINKED_CSN
columns.description: The Contact Serial Number (CSN) of the linked contact. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: CONTACT_INSTANT_TM
columns.description: This column will store the instant for the linked contact. Instant stored here will be used by One Time documentation flowsheets.
